events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and the tracking information shows no updates. My package is very late and I need to know when it will arrive.
The customer's issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on their description of late shipping and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Clara to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your package is delayed and I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code so I can check the shipment status with our carrier?
Sure, my order number is 8745692 and the tracking code is TRK1234567890. Please let me know what’s going on.
After checking with the shipping company, it appears there was an unexpected delay, but your package should arrive within the next 3 days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Three more days is quite frustrating since I needed the item earlier. Is there any way to expedite the delivery or any compensation?
We understand your frustration and as a gesture of goodwill, we will refund the shipping cost and upgrade the delivery for free on your next order.
Thank you for the offer and quick response. That helps a lot. I appreciate the support and look forward to receiving my package soon.
I’m glad we could assist you. Your case is marked resolved, and we are monitoring the delivery to ensure it reaches you within the updated timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your package. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the delivery has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing your support case. Thank you for contacting us.
